duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintains operational databases ensuring system performance, availability, reliability, security, recoverability, and efficient usage of server infrastructure resources.
Diagnoses, troubleshoots, and resolves database related issues including storage, performance, availability, data integrity, and security.
Automates database management, maintenance, and data processing activities.
Creates, modifies, maintains, and optimizes database objects such as indexes, tables, triggers, constraints, stored procedures, etc.
Collaborates with technical/non-technical resources regarding project work, POCs, and troubleshooting.
Participates in 24/7 on-call rotation and escalates issues as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or other technical discipline (Technical Certifications are a plus)
